short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap out posts about the 2016 election with more relevant, actionable political information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HotSwap swaps out ALL posts about the 2016 election (from every side of the aisle) with relevant, actionable political engagement information and throws in a GIF of puppies for good measure. Posts are not deleted or removed in any way. You can still elect to view them, but they are hidden by default on your news feed.
DISCLAIMER: The filtering system is still under development. It may hide things it shouldnâ€™t or miss political posts. HotSwap is improving every day. We apologize any inconveniences this might cause.
